Yet another low effort sight made by me because i was bored
It is the tank cat and the cat from battle cats!
As always if you want to use it put it into War Thunder\UserSights\all_tanks
Now go! Destroy those targets!
A sight made for Roo (Rooivalk) in WTUDS with sight lines every 500m

A very, VERY low effort sight i made for me and my buddies.
I decided to throw it on here lol
have fun with these creatures while destroying targets!
Forgot to mention this is a all_tanks scope, so put it in this directory:
War Thunder\UserSights\all_tanks

#collimator #sight #aircraft #plane #germany #ge #us #usa #italy #sweden #israel #bf109 #sakeen #s199 #bf109b1 #bf109e #bf109e4 #bf109e1 #bf109e3 #bf109e7 #flegelsbf109a #bf109f #bf109f4 #bf109g2 #bf109g6 #bf109g14 #bf109k #bf109k4 #bf109z #zwilling #bf109g6erla #wfrgr210 #rockets #bf109t2

Update 9-26-25: Added support for Bf109 T-2

COMBO collimator sight pack for the Messerschmitt Bf-109 Family. The 109z is also included. The 109 G-6 has a rocket sight for the Wfr. Gr. 210mm rockets; make sure to follow the speed guide! All Bf-109's that include the 30mm in the nose have the sight set ...

The LOSAT being a missile based tank have that barebones WT default sight that, after all those years this sorta bugs me out now
So, I drew this one, it's purely fictional

There's a little block for the .50 on top, if you adjust the range, you can get it away from the center of the sight without impacting the missile aim point

On the left there's some info about the missile like range, flight duration and penetration
(The pen is surely wrong past 1500m, but I couldn't find the data, so if anyone got a graph..)

#losat #losat_ccvl #ccvl #fictional

Micky Vainilla interpreted by Diego Capusotto. Micky Vainilla is NOT Hitler nor an emo version of him, HE HAS NOTHING TO DO WITH HIM.
The sight comes in small, medium and large. (Photos taken from the M109G sight)
#argentina #comedy #MickyVainilla

#uk #britain #plane #planes #sight #collimator #hornet #hornetmkiii #hornetmki #hornetmk3 #hornetmk1 #rocket #rockets #rp3

Update 6-3-25: Added support for AP Mk I/II rockets

RP-3 Fixed and Gyroscopic sight for the British Hornet Mk3 and Mk1. Dive angle should be between 20-40 degrees for best results. Use the boxes beside the gun reticle when IAS is greater than 600kmh for 600m shots. The small reticles above and below are for Top attacks and when IAS is greater than 550kmh, respectively. Use the outer sight parts for aiming rockets at 300m distance or less. Use the bottom boxes when I...

#halflife2 #halflife #all_tanks #alltanks #sight #pickupthatcan
Desintegrate your enemies with Dross' smirk!

#m36_jackson

M36 Sight
Zoom :5.0x

Usage method : Put the. blk file in the folder of the vehicle，Restart the game，Select a custom sight in Game Options - General Combat Settings
Example : E:\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\War Thunder\UserSights\cn_m36

使用说明 : 把.blk文件放到对应载具的文件夹内，重启游戏或重新加载自定义瞄具，在游戏选项-通用战斗设置中选择自定义瞄具。
例 : E:\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\War Thunder\UserSights\cn_m36

#type58 #t34_85zis53

T-34-85 Sight
Zoom :4.0x

Usage method : Put the. blk file in the folder of the vehicle，Restart the game，Select a custom sight in Game Options - General Combat Settings
Example : E:\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\War Thunder\UserSights\cn_type_58

使用说明 : 把.blk文件放到对应载具的文件夹内，重启游戏或重新加载自定义瞄具，在游戏选项-通用战斗设置中选择自定义瞄具。
例 : E:\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\War Thunder\UserSights\cn_type_58
